title: Is This Woman Crazy For Having Multiple Bridal Showers?
description:
A listener has overheard some gossip in her office about one of her coworkers. Her coworker is newly engaged, and she has already planned FOUR bridal showers!
Everyone in the office is judging her for having too many showers. However this woman has a legitimate reason for having so many showers.
Is this one too many showers or not?
